Hi Trigger➛Caddy Request Record➛Name,

 

Thank you for using Up In The Air's caddy airport transportation service !

Your request for Trigger➛Caddy Request Record➛Caddy Size caddy (ID:  Trigger➛Caddy Request Record➛Number), will be available onTrigger➛Caddy Request Record➛Due date from the Trigger➛Caddy Request Record➛Terminals terminal.

We look forward to seeing you and hope you use us each time you fly. 

Kind Regards,

UP ! Management
